data.description: A data type for a specific set of versioned namespaces of a model.

modelName.description: A name of the model to which this version belongs.

draft.description: A sub-version number, such as a pre-release identifier.

baseNIEM.description: A NIEM release that this resource is based on.

uri.description: A target namespace or other ID for this model version.

changeSummary.description: A summary of the changes from the previous version, if applicable.

location.description: A URL for the model version folder.

conformanceTargets.description: One or more classes of artifact to which this artifact conforms.

more.description: Any additional metadata to be captured.

links.description: A data type for metadata about version-related resources.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

zip.description: The location of the zip file for this version.

folder.description: The folder location for this version.

model.description: A data type for metadata about a singular resource related to the source resource.

label.description: A relative label for a resource, such as a version number or a qualified name.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

namespaces.description: A data type for metadata about potentially multiple resources related to the source resource.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

properties.description: A data type for metadata about potentially multiple resources related to the source resource.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

types.description: A data type for metadata about potentially multiple resources related to the source resource.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.

codes.description: A data type for metadata about potentially multiple resources related to the source resource.

href.description: A URI for the target resource.
